mutants.original_line: consonants_word1 = [ch for ch in word1 if ch not in vowels]
mutants.mutated_line: consonants_word1 = [ch for ch in word1 if ch in vowels]

mutants.original_line: consonants_word2 = [ch for ch in word2 if ch not in vowels]
mutants.mutated_line: consonants_word2 = [ch for ch in word2 if ch in vowels]
